If you're interested in a heist movie with a unique twist, 'Man on Wire' would be a great choice. It tells the story of Philippe Petit, a tightrope walker who illegally walked between New York City's World Trade Center towers in 1974.

Alternatively, if you prefer a criminal trial drama, 'Find Me Guilty' with Ron Silver would be an engaging option. It covers the longest criminal trial in American history.
